title: ThreatPrediction
description: Schema that identifies a threat prediction for a scanned X-ray image.

version.description: The schema version that identifies threat prediction.

modelName.description: Name of the ML model that made the prediction.

imageID.description: ID of the scanned X-ray image.

imagePath.description: Path of the scanned X-ray image.

numberOfThreats.description: Number of dangerous objects on the image.

outputImagePath.description: Path of the output image with the bounding boxes

predictedObjects.description: Classes of the objects that were detected by the model.

confidenceScores.description: Confidence scores of each predicted objects.
